titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection is comprised of a Busch family history in 24 volumes. The volumes include text, photographs, original documents, photocopies and photostats of original documents, abstracts from printed sources, and correspondence related to the research. Related families include Palmer, Cutler, Hayhurst, Corning, Fort, Jeffries, Boyle, Carpenter, Jung, O'Donnell, Martin, Furlong, Jenkins, Campbell, Smith, Horner, Somers, Leaming, Vezin, von Lengercke, Kalisky, Thomann, Mentzel, and Grant.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Bequest from the estate of Emilie deHellebranth of Atlantic County, New Jersey.
